XI.iii.1.D.3.k
.
Eligible Claimants for Non-Government Headstones
Any person, including the executor, administrator, or a person representing the deceasedâ€™s estate, who purchased the headstone or marker or who paid for the additional engraving on an existing headstone or marker may file a claim.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
